definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to make oneself an object of ridicule

sentences.english: I-of the law excuses no one .
sentences.chinese: 不知法不能作爲免罪的口實。

sentences.english: I-of the law excuses no man.
sentences.chinese: 不知法不能作爲免罪的口實。

sentences.english: When people mean to do bad and cruel things, they can easily make excuses for it.
sentences.chinese: 凡人慾爲兇惡殘酷之行，其口實正自易求也。

sentences.english: Such an excuse to leave after the thing that.
sentences.chinese: 這樣免得留下口實以後說事兒。
